meta.name: description
meta.content: ObjectLab Kit offers free and open source Date calculators, released under the business-friendly Apache 2.0 license.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Date calculator, IMM Dates, Period Calculator, Financial Calendar, Business Calendar, java, open source

subsection.name: Maven
subsection.p: If you're using Maven, setup is easy, as DateCalc is in the Maven Central Repository.

subsection.name: Download the Jars
subsection.p: If you are not using Maven, you can download the jars here.
